thread.section_title: Rydges Kensington London - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent location
thread.title_full: Excellent location - Review of Rydges Kensington London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: WelshStephanie
title: Excellent location
text:
This hotel is lovely, spotlessly clean, very close to Gloucester Rd Tube station. I stayed here twice and the rooms are tiny, not unusual for London, but even so, they were some of the smallest.
Not sure the double I had would have done for two of us. That said it was fine for just me.
I would stay here again and if I needed a bigger room, I would upgrade.
